title: Govt to explore strengthening AI deepfake laws

title: How Attending the ET AI Conclave & Awards 2025 Strengthens Your AI Point of View and Leadership Strategy
description: Attending the ET AI Conclave & Awards 2025 in Bengaluru offers business leaders a critical opportunity to deepen their understanding of how artificial intelligence is being built, adopted, and governed in real time. The event blends strategic insights with peer learning, recognition of excellence, and high-quality networking so attendees leave with a stronger point of view on AI strategy, deployment, and impact.

title: AI pilot and robot aiming for faster lung cancer diagnosis
description: The pilot scheme, being launched by the NHS, will use artificial intelligence (AI) and robotic technology to improve the detection and biopsy.
content:
The pilot scheme, being launched by the NHS, will use artificial intelligence (AI) and robotic technology to improve the detection and biopsy of hard-to-reach lung cancers.
